WRITING.TEXT: Nice, where did you buy this from? Link?
Yes. The sound quality is ok though as its not a 3 head player. But its compact which is what I wanted.

WRITING.TITLE: Enjoying my new cartridge - Denon DL 160

WRITING.TEXT: Picked up on Ebay the out of production Denon DL 160 cartridge after my AT440mla stylus got bent. First impression: Very detailed sound but less brighter than the AT440mla and punchy bass. Next: Waiting for the Emotiva preamp to arrive so I can update on difference in sound.
Quick update: The Emotiva XPS-1 preamp just made this cartridge a lot more louder and punchier. Really digging this combo!
Nirvana - Bleach playing on my recently acquired NAD 6340 deck. Sound quality is good with powerful bass. Vocals could be more upfront but a good tape nonetheless.

@Geezheeztall...Is it easy to adjust the azimuth or you needed a professional to do it? Mine sounds good mostly but some tapes sound pretty bad on the NAD whereas they sound fine on my Teac R-H 500 deck.

WRITING.TITLE: Best sounding albums on cassette
WRITING.TEXT: Which are the essential albums to own on tape based only on sound/recording quality? Could be both old/reissues and latest releases.

gt;i think the first tape i listened to when i got back into this hobby was nirvana's unplugged album. it sounded amazing to me, and i don't even like nirvana. it's why i used that tape, cus i didn't care. but the recording and mastering are amazing and even the cassette sounds clear and clean. Totally agree. I used to listen to it on a walkman while taking classes in college... lol.

WRITING.TITLE: Just ordered this from Amazon... cannot wait to receive it!

WRITING.TEXT: This one sounds super awesome. Also, some trippy music too! Great release.
Me too! Friends said it looked cool.
Actually I am in Dubai so shipping is cheaper from UK.

Recently bought this off Discogs and Side B plays fine but Side A plays sluggish with the speed going down and up. Is this an issue with the tape or my cassette player. Has happened before with couple of other tapes too.
Thanks. Unfortunately the cassette does not have screws to open it which I found strange!
I also had a tape stuck recently with the heads up. Try pressing the stop button many times. It might work as it worked in mine. All the best!
I had but I sold it a week ago :(
IMO the build quality of Pioneer PLX-1000 is not so good. Does not feel as solid as a Technics plus is not so cheap as well!
Those VU meters are slick! Enjoy your new toy.

Thanks

WRITING.TITLE: Scored the original Japanese pressings of the first three Logic System albums from HK!

WRITING.TEXT: Was in hong kong last week and got a dozen vinyl from a seller named Paul who's shop is quite famous and has a huge collection covering all genres. Will post more stuff.
Got this in the mail last week. Music inspired by the Millennium Trilogy. Sounds as good as it looks! Some heavy bass recording this.

WRITING.TITLE: Scored these near mint Vertigo spiral pressings in HK for $25 each. So happy!

WRITING.TEXT: Anyone here has this particular model or any other Akai deck? I am thinking of picking this up.
I am getting it for $150 plus shipping. The Idler and cam motor belts have been replaced and the deck is serviced.
Subscribed!

Disk Union store's are very expensive although well organized. I would prefer Recofan over it any day as the prices are reasonable. Also, worth mentioning is a small place in Shibuya (on the 2nd floor of an apartment building) called Rockabilly records which is run by a super friendly Japanese couple who are passionate about Rock n roll, blues and country music and have a great collection!
Thanks for the heads up as always! Ordered Dylan Highway 61 and Satriani.
Bought a used Yamaha CA-X1 in near mint condition after my Pioneer SX-939 broke down. Slightly bright but very punchy sound. Does anyone have or know about this model?
Unfortunately I am in Dubai :( Here vintage gear has very little love.

WRITING.TITLE: Just bought this on eBay. My favorite Ghibli film's soundtrack!

WRITING.TEXT: Just searched for Laputa as that's the original Japanese name. There is a seller based in UK who has 2 more tapes for sale: Totoro (acoustic version) and Nausicaa.
If you haven't watched the film, please do as the story and characters are simply great. And the music by Joe Hisaishi is just terrific!

WRITING.TITLE: Handwritten note and Origami with my purchase!

I recently bought a Sony 80 min metal tape from ebay for about $12 plus shipping but when I recorded some music from vinyl I did not notice any major improvement in sound quality over chrome tape. Maybe it's my cassette deck. I would suggest go for Maxell XL II or TDK SA type II cassettes as they are still cheaper than metal.

WRITING.TITLE: My purchases in last three months

WRITING.TEXT: This happened to a Sony CDix IV metal tape. Was recording on my NAD 6340 and suddenly the audio sounded distorted. Only one side of the tape is damaged while the other side plays fine. Is this a faulty recording head or capstan issue?
I don't think the belt broke as I can play normally after this incident. Where is the takeup reel located?

Thanks for your elaborate reply! i have been regularly cleaning both capstan and pinch roller with cleaning solution specifically for tape players. Also, my player does not allow me to play with the door open.
You mean the pinch roller? Will try to adjust it. Thanks!

WRITING.TITLE: One of the most innovative packaging ever!

WRITING.TEXT: Nice idea! I am ready to pay shipping as well.
Anyone would like a Bollywood mix tape with some funky psychedelic Indian songs? PM me if interested.
I'm interested in Dio and Iron butterfly. How much will it be including international shipping?
No worries mate
Are the Sabbath tapes still available?
Also interested in Zep, Ozzy amp; Roger Waters.
Thanks. I will take the Zep 2 amp;3, Sabbath Live Evil amp; Blizzard of Oz. I am in Dubai so how much will be the shipping? Do you still have the Floyd tapes as well? Dark side amp; The Wall?

WRITING.TITLE: Mint Pioneer CT-777 scored on eBay!

WRITING.TEXT: Scored an almost mint condition Pioneer CT-777 off eBay for a reasonable price. Sounded great after I cleaned the head and pinch rollers. The low end is amazing which offsets my slightly bright Yamaha amp. Also tried the Super Auto BLE system to record from vinyl and Boy! I could not make out the difference in sound between vinyl and tape! All in all happy with the purchase. There is one small issue though- The display shows 'Metal' irrespective of any tape playing. Anyone can advise why this is happening and how it can be fixed?
Does it have any effect on sound quality since the player thinks all tapes are Metal?
How much if I may ask?

WRITING.TITLE: Recording query
WRITING.TEXT: How many times can one record on a blank tape (mostly chrome) before it loses sound quality?
Do you ship internationally? I am interested in some tapes. How much to ship to Dubai?
Interested in : Abraxas, Radio KAOS, Eat a Peach, Led Zep 2 amp;3 and Presence.

WRITING.TITLE: Recent purchase! Anyone like this band?

WRITING.TEXT: Is there a cassette release of this?
Me too!
Waiting for Deadwing to be reissued.
Enjoy this beauty!

WRITING.TITLE: B amp;W shot of Jeep Wrangler Unlimited 2017

WRITING.TEXT: Early morning shot of my 2 days old 2017 JK on a Fujifilm X100t alongside the creek in Dubai. Really enjoying my new ride!

I usually buy more new music (mostly electronic) on tapes to support indie artists than old music. For older stuff I usually buy original vinyl or reissues. But the most enjoyment I get is while making mixtapes as I feel that is what cassette recorders are made for!
Fleabay. Paid a significant amount but so worth it!

WRITING.TITLE: Jolida JD-9A tube preamp upgraded with Tung Sol gold tubes.....vinyl never sounded better!

WRITING.TEXT: My new Jolida preamp with upgraded tubes and capacitors. Got it for a good discounted price. I was using a tiny Emotiva preamp before and the difference in sound is huge. Very open soundstage and greater instrument separation (especially noticeable listening to Jazz). A tad bright but that could be my vintage Yamaha amp. Overall couldn't be happier with my purchase!
It is a decent manufacturer and the build quality of the unit is awesome. Plus with a few upgrades, it can be improved quite a lot.
No. The original tubes are not great. These tubes were fitted by the seller. Check out needle doctor website for more info.

WRITING.TITLE: Finally finished watching all episodes on 19th July
WRITING.TEXT: without realising that the show started on the same day back in 2007. What a coincidence!

WRITING.TITLE: Ladakh-Kashmir, India. 18, 380 feet above sea level.

WRITING.TEXT: I recently upgraded to a tube phono preamp and was really happy with the sound after replacing stock tubes with vintage NOS Philips Valvo tubes. But the itch to upgrade did not stop there. So here is my new Otello MC cartridge from Soundsmith to replace my Denon DL140. Looking forward to spending time installing it.
You should. This is their most affordable model and customer service is great.
You really should. It has exceeded my expectations! Slightly laidback but clear at the same time. The separation is awesome and sounds very liquidy.
How much did you get it for?
Ordered last copy of part 2 of the trilogy.
Genception!

WRITING.TITLE: Noob question: What is Hardware Wallet?
WRITING.TEXT: I currently have my cryptos in freewallet.org wallets but I have read that there could be issues if I do not have private keys. I have also read that the safest bet is to hold your cryptos in a hardware or hard wallet. Is that true? If yes, then how to go about it?
I am lazy bro!
Thanks. Since freewallet does not show my private key, how do I transfer my bitcoin to the hard wallet? Does the hard wallet also have a key or QR code of its own?

I would recommend everyone who loves free jazz/prog/jazz fusion to blindly pick this vinyl reissue from ECM. Stellar musicianship and such awesome sound quality! I had goosebumps listening to the life like sounding guitar, piano and drums. This is by far the finest sounding albums in my vinyl collection.
Found this rare gem in the wild. Sounds fantastic!
I would suggest to get it from the link below. They are selling a pack of 9 belts of universal sizes for 1/3rd price than ebay: https://tapeline.info/v2/cassette-drive-belts.html
Added these babies to my modest collection of blanks. Has great reviews!
NAC have already started manufacturing blanks. There are three types available on their website with a minimum order of 10 tapes.
You mean pocket?
eBay
Which speakers are those?

WRITING.TITLE: Tea Estate, Nuwara Eliya, Sri Lanka [OC] 1620x1080

WRITING.TEXT: Taken on an early morning nature walk through the Tea Estate. The hills seen far away are near Kandy which is about 80 kms from Nuwara Eliya - a hill station with year round cool temperatures and tea plantations everywhere.

WRITING.TITLE: Anyone has seen this in the wild?

WRITING.TEXT: Thanks! My Pioneer deck sounds really awesome. I couldn't be happier. It is most likely a Yokohama tape. I don't plan to open it anytime soon as it is a type I and I usually record only on chrome tapes.

WRITING.TITLE: AIWA Walkman issue
WRITING.TEXT: I ordered an AIWA HS-G35 Walkman from eBay which was advertised as fully functional which it is but when I played it sounded as though the batteries are dying. So I thought it's an old belt issue and decided to replace them with the ones I had at home which were a close match but not the same thickness. It is virtually impossible to replace the main belt in this model unlike most Sony Walkman's without de-soldering some wires but I somehow managed to do it. It's playing much better now...a bit if flutter when moved but otherwise good. But the RWD and FWD seems to be reversed! How is that possible since I did not touch anything else?

Thanks for your reply. I believe it's the second problem as the belt is twisted and I have installed it blindly as I cannot see it is going around which pulley. There is a second smaller belt which is on top of the main belt and it regulates the speed so I am assuming it is coming from the motor.
Latest additions to my rapidly growing tape collection!
Latest additions to my rapidly growing tape collection!
What a coincidence! I am taping Sorcerer and Thief from vinyl to cassette right now.
Soundtrack of my college days!

WRITING.TITLE: DIY Labels are so much fun!

WRITING.TEXT: I never thought doing something which you had done last more than 20 years ago would bring so much fun and memories!
I have Phish-Junta but not interested in any of these tapes. Do you have anything else to trade? PM me if needed.
My bad.
Finally got the holy grail of Walkman's in my hands and it is as amazing as everyone says it is! Sounds great and works flawlessly. Here's to more tape buying and recording sprees!
True although I prefer the Maxell's more.

Please forgive me for my horrible writing skills. I have rekindled my love for fountain pens and have decided to use them extensively and in the process improve my handwriting. Bought this ink along with a double pen case from Franklin Christoph and so far liking it.
I don't think it is restored. It was listed as fully functional. Might have had a belt replacement but all buttons including the counter are working like new.
Thank you!
I agree. I haven't hooked it up to my hi-fi yet.
Sure they are. The only flaw being that the highs are rolled off but for the price one cannot complain. And so comfortable!
German ebay. Paid a decent amount.
Where did you buy it from? And what is the nib size? I am thinking of buying one from Amazon Japan.
I picked up Volume 2 as I have the first on vinyl.
One of the best blank tapes to record on. IMO better than TDK type II tapes.
Not so happy with the nib grinding as it's not as smooth as I would have liked it to be. The ink is a very uncommon dark burgundy/wine colour with good saturation.
Thanks :)
Bought it from Japan.
Lol...I thought the same thing while uploading.
Dan Smith

I am not so pissed at it being scratchy as I am on the pen writing smoother at an angle of almost 85 degrees when I had clearly given my writing angle of around 60 degrees and even sent photos of my hand holding a pen.
I need this!!
Apologies for the incorrect Ink name in the image (probably due to over excitement to post).
My new Hamilton Khaki King Automatic has not left my wrist since I received it on Thursday (except while sleeping and in the shower of course!).
My new Hamilton Khaki King Automatic with H-40 movement and 80 hours power reserve. It has not left my wrist since I received it on Thursday (except while sleeping and in the shower of course!).

My new Hamilton Khaki King Automatic with H-40 movement and 80 hours power reserve. The strap is a dark brown leather strap hand made in Sweden from cheapesnatostraps. The watch has not left my wrist since I received it on Thursday (except while sleeping and in the shower of course!). This is my first expensive watch buy and I have a feeling it's not going to be the last. Any other Khaki King owners here, raise your hands!

My new Hamilton Khaki King Automatic with H-40 movement and 80 hours power reserve. I recently lost my Seiko SKX007J1 at an airport (Don't ask how...it was my stupidity). I had been looking at Seiko's and Orient's but a watch enthusiast friend suggested Hamilton for it's price to quality ratio. Got a good deal on Jomashop although I did have to pay custom duties in my country. It came with a tan coloured Leather band which I am not too fond of so I changed it to a dark brown leather strap hand made in Sweden from cheapesnatostraps. It's a thin strap but seems quite good quality for the price. The watch has not left my wrist since I received it on Thursday (except while sleeping and in the shower of course!). I am glad I listened to my friend. This is my first expensive watch buy and I have a feeling it's not going to be the last. Any other Khaki King owners here, raise your hands!
I prefer straps/bands to bracelets as they are lighter and more comfortable to wear throughout the day.
Why don't you like the crown? Any specific reason?
New Ink Day
Yes it does feel cheap compared to a Seiko crown. Wish it was a screw down.
Yes.
Yes it is. It's not my favorite paper to be honest. I prefer Life or Tomoe River more.

WRITING.TITLE: New notebook day - Toroko Design Breeze

WRITING.TEXT: First time writing on Tomoe River paper and my jaw dropped as soon as the nib glided on the butter smooth surface. I instantly fell in love with it! No bleedthrough and absolutely no feathering. And to add to it, the notebook screams quality in every sense - 183 pages but still not thick, lays perfectly flat, dot grid and comes with a loose plastic page with a ruler marked on two edges which can be used as a bookmark and 4 ink swatch pages for keeping a record of your inks. I do not need to experiment anymore. This is the ultimate notebook for me at least and those who have never tried Tomoe River paper - just dive into it. Forget the Rhodia's and Clairefontaine's of the paper world. This is the real deal. And pretty cheap too!
Cannot make out the sheen in the Jungle Volcano or maybe it's the picture.
Thanks for clarifying. I recently ordered this ink but have not got it yet.
I have ordered this along with Ghat Green and Monsoon Sky. I have many other inks so I don't think they will finish anytime soon.

40-50!! Wow...I am at a measly 10 right now including the 3 Krishna inks on the way. I still have a few on my wish list - Diamine Ancient Copper, Pilot Iroshizuku Yama Budo and Robert Oster Tranquility.
Estranged!
I have 6 of these and have started recording on these from vinyl. Great stuff!

If I was you, living in Iceland, I will look for a used Sony Walkman (preferably WM-D6c) in good condition on eBay. It is as good if not better than most cassette decks plus portable. Try the german site for cheaper prices.

I wish I had visited Maruzen on my last Tokyo trip. I only went to Kingdom Pens and they did not have any Sailor's in stock (Imagine!) So had to settle on. Pelikan M215. If there was only one store I could visit next time, which one would you recommend? And did you go to any vintage pen shop?
Good choice!
What's a last pass?
Enjoy for your lifetime as it is a Technics!

WRITING.TITLE: NPD/NID - Pocket 66 with Fire amp; Ice!

WRITING.TEXT: Pen: Franklin Christoph Pocket 66 Ink: Robert Oster Fire and Ice Notebook: Toroko Breeze For some reason, not getting as much sheen as seen in online photos. Even though the feed looks like it's on fire!

WRITING.TITLE: Not paying $85 for the vinyl. Tapes FTW!

WRITING.TEXT: It's for preorder on Amazon.
Need the Muddy Banks tape. Used to listen to that at a friend's place who was a huge Nirvana fan!
I recently got the Pocket 66 with a Masuyama medium stub. What nib did you go for?
I have a Japanese pressing of this on vinyl.

Inked my Franklin Christoph Pocket 66 (as an eyedropper) with Krishna Inks Jungle Volcano and was not so impressed with it so removed the ink in a couple of days but it had left a pink residue on inside of the frosted body which is not coming off. I have tried cleaning with alcohol, glass cleaner, toilet cleaner and even Goo Gone but no success. Any tips on what will help?
Don't have a pen flush but I guess that also contains alcohol, right?
I thought of using bleach but I'm scared that it might damage the finish inside the barrel. It's not a cheap pen.
I did not soak in alcohol. Just rubbed the stain with a Q-tip.
Is this because the ink is one with a lot of sheen?
Which FC is that?
Thanks guys. Will try the magic erasure and report back as it's the easier solution (pun intended) than buying a pen flush or cleaning with ammonia etc.

WRITING.TITLE: New Metallica tape in 2018. Who would've thought?!

WRITING.TEXT: By new I meant not a used one. This was released last month by the band on their own label - Blackened Records.
Looks like Robert Oster to me.

WRITING.TITLE: PO-35 recording issue
WRITING.TEXT: New to PO's and bought the 35 KO! yesterday. I am having issues recording samples. I managed to record one this morning via the microphone but cannot record another one despite trying a lot (even via line-in). What am I doing wrong?

No I figured out my mistake. I was pressing Rec and slot nbee together instead of one after the other. Now it's working! But in my hurry to free up memory I deleted all the built-in drum samples from slots 10-12. Can they be brought back?
How do you restore factory presets?
Thanks!

Just received this release from Ghost Box Records. The music is by The Advisory Circle and it can be classified as Library music (electronic). The concept is Photography and how it conveys the disappearance of reality. The cover has a gold foil finish to it and looks gorgeous. The vinyl sounds spectacular (even without cleaning) and reminds me how good my setup is. Truly a must have!
The Midori is in my wantlist for some time now. I bought a Life notebook on my last visit. Is the Hokusai a notebook or a book of his paintings?

Got my Franklin-Christopb Model 20 Marietta in Vintage Green today and cannot stop admiring it! It is a stunning dark green colour with nice shading and glossy acrylic which gives it an almost premium ebonite kind of look. The size is also perfect for my medium hands, even posted. I got their proprietary steel SIG nib in Broad which is super smooth at all angles. Overall, a great EDC pen! The ink is Noodler's Lexington Gray which was on my wish list for long. Amazing shading and super fast drying!
Yes, I guess you are right. I have never used a Zoom nib and just assumed it is similar to the SIG. Will edit that out.
The SIG has lived up to it's reputation. Also, order broad if you like more ink flow as FC pens tend to run a bit dry.
No, not green. It is a lighter gray with crazy shading.
Thanks for the explanation. Cheers!
I have just started using it but no problems so far while writing. I guess you have to wipe the excess ink off while filling but it's one time.
Nawab restaurant in Bur Dubai

WRITING.TITLE: A collection I am truly proud of!

WRITING.TEXT: From left to right: 1945 Parker Vacumatic Gilden Pearl Major (Made in Canada) F nib. Montblanc 146 Unicef Special Edition. F nib. Franklin Christoph Model 20 Marietta in Vintage Green. Broad SIG nib. Montegrappa GoT SE Targaryen. M nib. Monteverde Regatta Northern Lights Limited Edition. F nib.
Yes it is beautiful. Even I was surprised by how good it looks in person. There is a small issue though. A couple of spots of black plating on the nib has come off.
It sure is :)
Thanks Emma!
Amen.
Also, the nib is without doubt the best of the lot. Very wet and smooth as butter.
Sailor Pro Gear Slim for me too.
Holodeck Records
Where did you buy the nib from?
One question. Why is the price of Lamy 2000 all over the place online? From $319 on Pen Chalet to $167 on Goulet to $122 on eBay? Also, Lamy 2000 or Pilot Vanishing Point?
Limited / Special edition 3776s are generally higher priced than the regular version's and this one is slightly more expensive possibly because of the finish.

This is the Nagaoka MP-150 and it sounds fantastic! Bought it from Amazon Japan for much cheaper than elsewhere and regretting not getting it earlier. The sound is very musical with amazing deep bass but open high end and a warm mid range. This is like the ultimate combo one can ask for. Studio recordings sound alive and there is no listening fatigue. I had a Soundsmith Otello before this and it started giving distortion so have sent it for repair. I am sure the MP-150 will hands down beat any other cartridge in its price range or more. Fellow owners can chip in.
Got it for $211 as the tax gets deducted at checkout. What pitfalls are you talking about?
Almost a $100 price difference and the 150 is good enough for me.
They stick out because the stylus needs to be 52mm from end of the headshell. Not a major gripe for me.
Trust me it is as I have owned both. The 110 had it's limitations especially in the higher end. And the bass of the 150 is just awesome!
Sorry, haven't heard the 2M Blue.
A headshell upgrade is only necessary if your cartridge is too heavy or light. The combined weight of both makes a difference in tracking correctly.
A warm mid-range means velvety vocals which are not shrill to the ears especially female vocals. Saying that, it can also be attributed to my tube phono preamp with Philips Mini-watt ECC83s.

Sometimes YouTube can have some accurate information when you don't have access to testing the sound yourself. I bought the MP-150 based on this review and he does comparisons as well. Also, I have heard that he does not get paid to review them and buys his own cartridges: https://youtu.be/ZhSFP0PJCE4
I think by recording, you mean pressing quality. It does matter a lot. But to get the best out of an audiophile pressing, your system should be capable to handle it.
True. But I was referring to the real audiophile pressings viz. QRP, Classic records, Pallas etc. MOV is hit and miss. Stopped buying them long back unless they have a rare title.
This price drop is insane considering the sound quality of this album!
Ordered mine today. How is your writing experience?
My MB146 Unicef LE has the best nib in my collection. Very springy and fun to write with. And the pen feels very pemium. Definitely worth it!

Congrats! I am sure you will enjoy it. Don't know why there is so little love for Montblanc in the pen world in general. Their build quality is awesome and nibs are great too. Yes, they are pricey but so are Visconti and Aurora and other Italian brands. But I doubt they offer as great customer service as MB.
It's a MUKATSUKU disc stabilizer.

Finally it arrived....my precious! Solid old book style package which feels truly from Middle Earth. The colored vinyl are super silent and more importantly it is the complete score. I'm surprised it them so long to release this in vinyl. But better late than never. There and back again... PS: It's also a good investment as the price has already increased and going up like crazy! Though I will never sell #128517;

Finally it arrived....my precious! Solid old book style package which feels truly from Middle Earth. The colored vinyl are super silent and more importantly it is the complete score. Also comes with a map of Middle Earth albeit one third so I guess the other two parts would be in the remaining boxsets. I'm surprised it took them so long to release this in vinyl. But better late than never. There and back again... PS: It's also a good investment as the price has already increased and going up like crazy! Though I will never sell #128517;
Five.
Bought it from Amazon Italy. Was late as there was zero publicity on this one. It's beyond me that such a huge release went unnoticed.
You got a great deal! I bought for $170 including shipping which was the cheapest back then.
It sure is
Please buy the mono version if you can....the sound quality is great. Or else a French Barclay pressing which you can get on discogs. You will thank me later.
Mine's in the mail....waiting desperately!
Amazing ambient synth goodness from Holodeck Records. The Thousand Door Whale Claw is so dope...pure electronic bliss!
Recently bought 3 of these for cheap and was wondering how they sound?
Thanks. Yes my cassette deck has auto calibration.
Both are wonderful, especially the Black Hole Party.

Got my first Sailor early this week and I am impressed. Exceeded my expectations and the amazingly smooth nib is already my second favorite and a close second to my MB 146 nib! Also, the PR ink is so bright and IMO matches the blue of the pen quite well. Overall, cannot be more happy with this purchase from Anderson Pens.
Mine was J. Herbin Bleu Nuit.

Moved to a new house recently when to my surprise found my first fountain pen I had bought from my own salary almost 15 years ago! It still had some blue-black ink which I cleaned using a pen flush and lots of water. Which ink should I fill it with? Suggestions welcome.
Herbin Blue Nuit
Lol.... you're welcome!
Thanks! Just thought at thr spur of the moment.

I have a brand new unused Lamy Safari Petrol with a medium nib for sale. Asking for $37. Also for sale is an almost full bottle of Noodler's Lexington Grey (filled only one pen). Asking for $10. Shipping to anywhere in the world is $18. Shipping remains the same if both are purchased together. First come first served.
Thanks....will do.

WRITING.TITLE: [WTB] Platinum 3776 Kumpoo limited edition
WRITING.TEXT: Willing to pay the original price for a new or lightly used Kumpoo with a soft medium or medium nib.
Is this still for sale? If yes then I will gladly take it.

Wifey got me a Mont Blanc Heritage Spider Metamorphosis Web Grey (phew!) Limited Edition ink bottle. She picked it up from Mumbai Airport Duty Free. Eager to try this one as I am a big fan of Grey inks and was on the lookout for a MB limited edition so this was a win-win. Hope it doesn't let me down.
Will do soon!
Me too!

I recently moved to a new bigger apartment and finally got a spare listening room. So I thought why not get the one thing which was on my mind since a long time: A proper wooden cabinet to house my modest collection of around 550 vinyl and more than 100 tapes. Since I am an architect, I designed it myself and got it made through one of my regular contractor's. It is in MDF but with a Zebrano veneer finish with a semi-matt polish/lacquer. The shutters are in clear glass. Each section holds roughly 100 vinyl. Saying that, it is very sturdy and looks good too. No more Kallax!
Will share the sketch I gave them.
Thanks!
Not really. A turntable needs a solid levelled base. Will not sound good on a shelf.
Got RotK for $100 on the day of its release!
Soundstage has gone bankrupt so might want to get a refund from them. Or open a claim with your bank or PayPal.
I have a Safari Petrol with a medium nib for sale in case anyone's interested. PM me.
Would you be interested in a Safari Petrol?
Super!
He seems pretty energized!

What a coincidence! I bought the vinyl of the performance of this symphony by the great Zubin Mehta with the London Philharmonic Orchestra just this week. It is considered one of the best recordings of it.
Will do. Thanks.

This is my first purchase from video game soundtrack label DATA DISCS and what an amazing package! This is a double vinyl release of the music from Konami's classic 1994 adventure game Policenauts and comes with a lithographic print and a booklet of some great artwork of the game characters and scenes on high quality white paper which can be also made into small posters. Will post more images in comments if possible. The sound quality is superb and does not feel like regular 8-bit music but more complex and layered. Definitely worth a buy!
Same here.

Good to know that young guys like you are getting into 'real' music and not today's crap. If you like The Who, I would suggest check Creedence Clearwater Revival, The Doors, Dire Straits and Jimi Hendrix (especially since you are into playing guitar). The key is to be open to listen to all genres and then decide for yourself which one you prefer more. The worst that can happen is you like all genres....then you just can't stop buying vinyl. Story of my life :)
Have patience as they keep bringing back the green and other colours regularly. You can write to their customer service which is one of the best ever.
Possibly....LOL!

WRITING.TITLE: My Grail pen is finally here!

WRITING.TEXT: After more than two months of waiting and losing one pen in transit (thanks to Goulet Pens and USPS) I finally managed to get one from a Spanish online store. Honestly, I thought I will never own this pen as it is sold out almost everywhere (including eBay!) so this one is special to me. This is the Platinum 3776 Century SE Kumpoo #289 out of 2500 pieces ever made. And trust me, it does look more goergous than the pictures. It has a soft medium nib which is very springy but hardly any line variation. It likes like a western fine with a lot of feedback (more than Sailor) but I don't mind it. Unfortunately Platinum did not offer a broad nib or I would have gone for it. It writes pretty smooth on Tomoe River paper.
Estilograficas
Yes, I did.
Well, it became nearly unobtainable for me due to it's scarcity!
I got it for the regular online price.
Lamy 2000 has mixed reviews although it is on my wish list.
The Yes years boxset arrived today and it looks amazing! Comes with a booklet too.
I also have this on both cassette and vinyl. My all time fav soundtrack!

WRITING.TITLE: [WTS] Platinum 3776 Kumpoo Limited Edition [N]
WRITING.TEXT: SOLD

Up for sale is a special edition Platinum#3776 'Kumpoo' which is very rare to find these days as only 2500 were made. It comes with a Soft medium 14K gold springy nib and writes great with a hint of line variation. Comes with a converter. Asking for USD 300 plus USD 25 shipping to anywhere in the world.
Verification pic: http://imgur.com/cFVAaKk Sorry for the delay.
Photo added.
Photo added.
Photo added.

WRITING.TITLE: [WTS] Lamy Safari Petrol 2018 SE [N]
WRITING.TEXT: For sale is a brand new Lamy Safari Petrol (2018 special edition) with a M nib. Comes with a cartridge but no convertor. Asking for $35 plus $15 shipping to anywhere in the world. Verification: http://imgur.com/oHZryqP
The pen is sold.
Is the nib a Masuyama needlepoint?
Looks amazing! Where did you purchase it from and at what price? Also, which nib?
It's a spare one.
I lost my SKX at an airport while passing through the security check. I removed it and forgot to pick up from the tray. Realised it much later.
Is this US only? Can you ship international?
I am in Dubai, UAE.
Is this still available? Can you ship international?
Is it sold out now? Which nib did you go for?

Received this NOS Montblanc 22 yesterday from an Italian dealer specialising in Vintage FP's. The pen is in pristine condition and came with the original pamphlet with care instructions. It's a tad smaller than a 146 and the cap clicks into place with a satisfying sound. I especially loved the blue ink window although it's a bit difficult to view the ink level. Inked it up with Pilot Iroshizuku Yama-Guri and writes like a dream. Very smooth and fine line (though I prefer a bit broader) with no flex but I'm ok with that. All in all, very happy with my purchase.
That's so surprising because mine is not soft at all.
Quite agree.
Thanks!
Yes, it's my first Vintage MB and I am impressed!

Received the 50th anniversary box set today and it is beautiful. Worth every penny! And it has been a full circle in my vinyl journey as exactly 7 years ago on this very day, I purchased my first vinyl from Virgin - Electric Ladyland. And today I got the same album in a shiny 6 LP boxset. Ready to play on my newly refurbished Sansui AU-D7. Cannot wait!!
Well, she is electric.
Thanks Jonathan!
I have Eno's 'Another Green World' half-speed master and it sounds amazing. Worth getting it if you haven't yet.
Which model is this?

Shipping to anywhere in world: $16.** [Verification pic](https://imgur.com/a/bZybu5X)

Only in the booklet, not on the cover as Jimi hated it.

WRITING.TITLE: [WTS] Restored 1944 Parker Vacumatic Golden Pearl [A-]
WRITING.TEXT: **1944 Parker Vacumatic Fountain Pen (Size - 5" With Cap On)** with a new diaphragm installed. Golden brown barrel #160;and cap with the original blue diamond still intact which is rare. The pen features a 14K gold Parker nib which is original to the pen. #160;It writes as a firm fine. Cosmetically, the pen is in excellent condition with just a couple of very tiny black spots on the cap band. If not for them, the pen would rate as at least an A. Asking for $120 plus shipping to anywhere in the world. [Verification album] (http://imgur.com/a/EiFBWUW)
Fixed. Thanks for pointing it out.
Have you ever eye-dropped the pen?
I do not think so. I would rate it at least a B+ but unfortunately I cannot edit the title of the post now.
Replied
Robert Oster Fire and Ice
Sorry but the pen is sold. Just curious.... isn't the Pine needle a super expensive pen?
Can you share some pics if you don't mind?
Thanks. But I think I will pass this time.

WRITING.TITLE: Newly launched blank audio tapes from: Recording the Masters

WRITING.TEXT: Got 4 tapes from these guys and they are of solid quality. Normal Ferric tapes but with a special formula which makes them good for studio quality recordings.
No.
The cassette quality is hit and miss. I got a dud the first time and had to write to the band to send another one.
I recorded one side with Bobbie Gentry's first album from Tidal and it sounds great.

This is the half speed mastered box set of Creedence Clearwater Revival containing all seven of their studio albums. The packaging is awesome and I like that you can remove each vinyl individually without taking out the others. And did I tell you how freakin awesome this sounds! I already owned the individual albums but could not pass on this one. I have some original pressings and these sound as good or maybe even better.

I have the same question. Half-speed mastering should and does sound better than regular mastering. I can understand if it was re-mastered or sourced from digital but these are from the original masters so why should anyone bash them?
The actress who plays Beck can't act to save her life. So fake!
Picked the Black album from Tapeheadcity for the first time and it sounded exactly like the way it did the first time I had heard it!
Good to see a fellow Deep Purple fan. Just ordered a Slaves and Masters tape yesterday.
PM'd
Btw, the correct abbreviation of Bath amp; Body Works is BBW, not joking! I work in the retail industry and help build their stores.

WRITING.TITLE: Amazing...the song of my teenage wet dreams!

WRITING.TEXT: Come to think of it, the Amazing music video was probably one of the first proper depiction of VR in pop culture back in 90s and it's pretty much come true now.
The drawing courtesy: Mattias Adolfsson. @Mattiasink on Twitter
Did you buy it from Anderson Pens?
Confirmed.
Listen to Epitaph. If you don't like it then you will never enjoy King Crimson. But if you do then you are in for a treat.

WRITING.TITLE: [WTS] Brand new Lamy Safari Petrol (M} and Kaweco Sport Demonstrator (B-) bundle

WRITING.TEXT: For sale is a brand new (mostly out of stock) Lamy Safari Petrol 2017 SE with a medium nib. And a used Kaweco Sport Demonstrator bought from Japan in B- condition (Has the regular discoloration to the body as expected) but writes flawlessly with a M Bock nib. Will include a 20ml bottle of Krishna Monsoon ink for free. Asking USD 55 for both including shipping to anywhere in the world. Verification: http://imgur.com/kl1jH6I
Yes. It will be $45 including shipping.
Yes
UAE

What nib is that on the Platinum? I didn't enjoy writing on my Midori A5 dot grid with my Platinum 3776 Kumpoo with a SM nib as it felt like writing on glass....it could be the ink - Robert Oster Fire amp; Ice.
SM is awesome. Takes a little getting used to at first but then it is a pleasure. Surprisingly, I get less feedback than a Sailor broad nib.
Sorry, the Lamy Safari is sold but the Kaweco is still available. Also, have a Lamy Petrol ink bottle for sale too.

WRITING.TITLE: Does anyone of you do this?

WRITING.TEXT: Expecting a fresh haul of inks from Cult Pens UK soon and had to make this table in preparation of getting them! Am I the only one who does this or are there more like me?
Interesting.

I think my comment was a bit misleading. I am yet to receive some of the inks listed on there and this table was an attempt to decide which one to use in which pen. It's very difficult to do that in your head.
Btw, have got an extra bottle of Lamy Petrol in case anyone's interested.

WRITING.TITLE: I Am Godzilla You Are Japan

WRITING.TEXT: Yes, that's the name of the latest album from UK electronic artist Deadly Avenger. The first four pressings were sold out within hours. This is a limited edition fifth pressing on hot pink vinyl from Burning Witches Records The cover is a mirror finish sleeve which looks awesome and the music is also kick-ass. Recommended for people into dark synthwave and in general electronica.
Nope. Will check it out.
Love your pen and ink choices!
The first three Bjork album reissues.
Blanks? Let me know the review please.
When the Levee Breaks

Electronic music from a French artist from the 70s who was close to Jean-Michel Jarre, Pink Floyd, Soft Machine etc.The music is an ode to Mahabharata and Hindu mythology which has a tale about a warrior prince Arjun (Kshatriya means warrior in Sanskrit) who had to prove his prowess in a test by killing a bird from far away with a bow and arrow and he did it by hitting the bird's eye. The sound is very Vangelisque with a liberal use of ARP2600 and Moog modular systems.
How does it sound?
I am in Dubai and have a few Sony Hi-Fi type 1 tapes to sell. PM me if you are interested.
Damn this sub! Had to get it.
Love your pits. Would like to roleplay with you someday!
Pen sachi
I sold some at 6000. Now regretting :(
The PenBBS 309 Vermouth and 484 pen rest arrived today and now I know what the fuss is all about. Amazing quality for the price! Replaced the stock nib with an architect nib from Bobby off eBay.
You should get the architect nib. For $10 plus shipping you can't go wrong. And surprisingly both the pen and nib reached together.
New pen rest day....I just invented it LOL!
Thanks :)

WRITING.TITLE: Office colleague's shoes have leg indicators written on them.

WRITING.TEXT: The BASF Super Chrome's are awesome to record on. Enjoy!
I have the Pulse double tapes but didn't know about this. Thanks...will check it out.

Super thrilled to receive my second most expensive purchase till date - the Leonardo Momento Zero Rosewood Ebonite limited to 100 pieces. It comes with an unbelievably smooth 14K gold nib and a piston filling system. The size and weight is almost perfect for my hands and I can say that the pen truly sings!
Yes I am. Thanks!
It's very functional....makes the grip more sturdy. One of the small things that drew me towards this pen.
Bran would've love that.

WRITING.TITLE: Any 'The Crow' sound track fans out here?

WRITING.TEXT: Found a sealed tape of arguably one of the best soundtracks of the 90s.
How do they sound?
Hi... interested to know more.

Do you actually own a Montblanc FP? Or have you tried writing with a 146 or 149? It feels luxury and their nibs are among the best in the market. I will not comment on their pricing but I am surprised at the number of people on this sub ridiculing MB. One does not make fun of a $10K Rolex just because a $100 Seiko is equally good. Every good brand has it's market.
Prices reduced on the Sailor and Montegrappa GotT pens.
Sailor SOLD. Montegrappa Game of Thrones price further reduced. Very good deal.

For sale: Unopened bottle of Montblanc Limited Edition Emerald Ink. Very nice shade of green in a great bottle. Asking for USD 60 shipped to anywhere in the world. Includes PayPal fees as I cannot accept F amp;F payments. Thanks for looking! Verification: http://imgur.com/meNzHxM
This is probably a long shot but I would like to swap the 14K Broad nib in my Sailor Pro Gear Slim with a Naginata Togi nib. I am willing to pay the price difference between the two nibs.

Hi, I am interested in being your Pen pal. Have been following your posts and find your experiences fascinating and worth knowing about. Hope you feel like sharing your thoughts with me as I promise not to judge you or even try to force any unsolicited advice on you.
Very clever title! And they get ignored by everyone in the bar cause they are big show-offs and most people are jealous. GLWS!
I'm sure the bad boys will take them all home.

Verification: http://imgur.com/a/hVv9y4y So I have to unfortunately part with this amazing pen from Franklin Christoph in the much appreciated Model 1901. The acrylic finish is the amazing Cinnamaroon which is a combination of glossy grey swirls and two maroon bands. The material shines even in natural light when the pen is rotated. I am offering only the body for sale as I do not want to part with the lovely SIG nib by Jim Rouse. It takes any standard #6 nib unit. Asking for $190 shipped international via registered mail with tracking.

Verification: http://imgur.com/a/hVv9y4y So I have to unfortunately part with this amazing pen from Franklin Christoph in the much appreciated Model 1901. The acrylic finish is the amazing Cinnamaroon which is a combination of glossy grey swirls and two maroon bands. The material shines even in natural light when the pen is rotated. The pen is in immaculate condition. I am offering only the body for sale as I do not want to part with the lovely SIG nib by Jim Rouse. It takes any standard #6 nib unit. Thanks for letting me know but I am asking the price I bought it for plus shipping. No extras. Anyways...reduced to $50.

Hi, is this still available? Are you willing to part with it for $600 including international shipping?

I have lusted after this pen since the day I saw it in some pen videos and finally I got mine. And it has lived up to its reputation. The material is beautiful to say the least. And the fine steel nib is as good as it can be. Happy!

This is my favorite ambient album by Brian Eno. Although technically a soundtrack, it has all the trademark Eno Sounds and atmospheres. I already own this on CD and cassette and was thrilled when they announced this extended edition. The bonus LP could be an album on it's own merit. Such is the quality of the music on it. This is a must buy!

WRITING.TITLE: Colleagues say it looks like a dildo!

WRITING.TEXT: The latest addition to my pen collection - The Nauka Aqua from ASA Pens from India. It is a very long boat shaped pen (Nauka means boat in Hindi) but extremely well finished. The acrylic body is almost seamless and very smooth to the touch. Good value for money! It is best used eye-dropped. I ordered it nibless and installed an S.I.G nib by the Late Jim Rouse from Franklin-Christoph. And inked it with KWZ-Walk Over Vistula.
Well said!
Thanks! It is quite nice.
Yes. I prefer it without the clip.
Are you using the stock nib or Jowo nib?

I have a NOS 22 and can vouch that these pens are truly amazing. I would rate them better than Vacumatics any day since they both are kinda in a similar price range. The nib is what one can expect from Montblanc - Bouncy and a delight to write with. Mine has a fine nib and I prefer it to some of modern fine or medium nibs.

Selling my well kept and used only once Montegrappa GoT special edition - House Targaryen with a medium nib and a dragon shaped clip. The bronze finish pen is in excellent condition (like new) and comes in a decorative wooden box and converter. Asking for USD 185 shipped international. Verification: http://imgur.com/gallery/hdWOP6o
Thanks!

WRITING.TITLE: [WTS] Original NOS Aurora 88P in Black Celluloid with 18K Gold nib [B+]
WRITING.TEXT: **Verification:** [https://imgur.com/a/Gh5e8TJ](https://imgur.com/a/Gh5e8TJ) **For sale is an Ultra rare AURORA 88P #160;- #160;Black CELLULOID Fountain Pen With 14K GOLD Nib size M - Piston Filler #160; with a nice big clear ink window- From Mid 60's - POSSIBLY NOS - With original Aluminum Box and papers including certificate of authenticity and a serial number.** **IT'S THE LAST EVOLUTION OF THE ORIGINAL 88 DESIGNED BY MARCELLO NIZZOLI IN 1947.** **The pen has possibly never been used, #160;i have tested it once to check if it fills properly and writes well. And then flushed it with water. All functions are perfect. The nib writes on the finer side. It's in excellent condition but can have some very minor micro-scratches certainly not visible to the naked eye. The cap is also very shiny like new with no marks at all. Rating it as a B+ only due to the testing done by me.** **ASKING FOR USD 155 plus registered shipping as per actual.**
It's KWZ - Walk Over Vistula
SOLD!

WRITING.TITLE: [WTS] Esterbrook 9048 Flex Fine nib (rare to find in original box)
WRITING.TEXT: **For Sale:** A rare to find **ESTERBROOK RENEW POINT NIB UNIT - 9048, EXTRA FLEXIBLE FINE** in its original packaging. The nib is in a perfect condition and the flex is also nice (not too flexible) but enough for creative writing). Selling it as I'm not accustomed to flex nibs and wanted to try one but could not get used to it. I believe the nib fits all Esterbrook pens including the modern ones. Verification: [https://imgur.com/gallery/AK1Vyv2](https://imgur.com/gallery/AK1Vyv2) I am adding a **Kokuyo A5 Notebook cover** which holds two notebooks securely. #9679; The cover pocket can hold small items such as writing instruments and sticky notes that are frequently used with the notebook. Comes with a bookmark string. Asking for **USD 50** for both including international shipping. So basically, the Kokuyo cover is free but added to justify the $15 shipping cost from Dubai for just the nib.

WRITING.TITLE: Until the vinyl/regular CD version is released...

WRITING.TEXT: Yes. Fit the exact 90 min with a few spare on Side A. I followed the order of songs in deluxe version with one change - Choco Chip Trip was pushed to the end. 5 songs on each side.
Source were FLAC files ripped from a friend's CD.

Tapes are back big time. A lot of big artists including Metallica which released ' And Justice for All' on tape recently. But I mostly buy new music of indie artists who release specifically for tape from Bandcamp since the sound quality of new tapes is ok compared to the originals. For other stuff like this one which is not available on tape, I make my own on my 3 head recorder with auto alignment which is a good alternative to vinyl
WHY NOT? I can listen to it on my walkman!
I don't have a dedicated CD player. Just a Blu Ray player which does not sound great.
Unfortunately they don't. This was new old stock.
Moving like the Joker, eh?

WRITING.TITLE: [WTS] Leonardo Momento Zero Blue Hawaii (B+)
WRITING.TEXT: Verification: http://imgur.com/gallery/bBSq18E For Sale: A stunning Leonardo Momento Zero Blue Hawaii with a Fine nib and rhodium trims. The pictures do not do justice to this beauty! The material is just gorgeous and the pen feels very premium. The fine steel nib is ultra smooth with hardly any feedback. And the piston filling type convertor is also a nice touch. It is very lightly used and does not have any scratches or defects. The pen comes in a nice faux leather box with three cartridges. Asking for USD 150 including international shipping from UAE.
Yes the nib is very easy to replace. The pen comes with a fine nib but you can swap it with any other sized Leonardo nib.
The nib is a number 6 size but I don't know if you can screw in a No. 6 nib unit but you can certainly put just the nib on the feed.
You might want to buy the Schon Design pen then but it's a tiny pocket pen.
Thanks. Yes it's my favorite new brand. I wish I could keep this but I got other non-fountain pen purchases to make :(

WRITING.TITLE: [WTS] F-C Jim Rouse #6 S.I.G. nib (B+) on an ASA Nauka Translucent Blue
WRITING.TEXT: For Sale: A Franklin Christoph #6 broad S.i.G. nib tuned by the legendary nibmeister Late Jim Rouse (RIP). The nib writes flawlessly. Since I do not want to ship just the nib for fear of it getting damaged, I am including an ASA Nauka Demonstrator pen body which takes any standard Jowo #6 nib unit. The boat shaped pen is in a translucent blue acrylic which has a lovely matt feel to it. The pen is an eyedropper and the long barrel holds a ton of ink which looks great when it splashes inside it. I am asking USD 95 including shipping $60 for the nib unit and $15 registered worldwide shipping. So basically the pen body is for only $20. Verification: [https://imgur.com/a/IND1Fiw](https://imgur.com/a/IND1Fiw)

WRITING.TITLE: My first Panerai - Can't get my eyes off it!

WRITING.TEXT: Thanks! It's a PAM 914 which I believe replaces PAM 510(without the seconds hand) which has been discontinued. I originally wanted he 510 but prefer this one because of the sandwich dial and clean look.

This is my first luxury watch purchase and I am so stoked that I just can't get my eyes off it. It has an in-house P5000 Calibre movement with eight days power reserve. A sandwich dial and the trademark Panerai crown protector on a polished stainless steel case with an open back display (also sapphire glass) and patina lume make up this gorgeous timepiece. I have been getting compliments on it since I started wearing it.

WRITING.TITLE: [Panerai] PAM 914 - How does this look at blue hour?

WRITING.TEXT: This is my first luxury watch purchase and I am so stoked that I just can't get my eyes off it. It has an in-house P5000 Calibre movement with eight days power reserve. A sandwich dial and the trademark Panerai crown protector on a polished stainless steel case with an open back display (also sapphire glass) and patina lume make up this gorgeous timepiece. I have been getting compliments on it ever since I started wearing it. Although some people are shocked at the price, I am justifying it to myself by knowing that I have some unique watch history on my wrist.
I do have a smallish wrist but the watch sits comfortably on it so I guess it's the photo.

More images: [https://imgur.com/a/YrynP9f](https://imgur.com/a/YrynP9f) For Sale: A lightly used Hamilton Khaki King Automatic watch with the Hamilton Calibre H-40 in-house movement. It has an 80 hours power reserve and is in perfect working condition. The sapphire crystal and open case back is clean with no scratches of any kind. The bezel has a minor scratch which is seen in the first photo upon zooming at the bottom between 5 amp; 6 but hardly visible to the naked eye. Other than that there are micro scratches on the bezel and lugs that come with normal wear. Trust me the micro scratches are more pronounced in the photos than they actually are. The original leather strap has not been used at all as I had swapped it for a NATO strap and is like new. The watch will be shipped in it;'s original box and instruction booklet. There are no papers included. I will throw in a 20mm army green NATO. Asking for ~~$280~~ shipped with tracking number. SOLD.
Replied
Replied.

My order of Old Boy also reached me today. Bought it on Amazon UK for #163;9. Never heard of Climax...is it as good?

Thanks....guess I am late to the party. The ones I wanted - Dekalog and Deep Red are out of stock. Anyone selling Dekalog let me know.

WRITING.TITLE: Just in from Japan....new limited Utility edition.

WRITING.TEXT: The new limited edition DW-5610SUS-5JR ordered from Amazon Japan on Monday night and received on Thursday morning! This beauty comes with two straps - a resin one in the same colour as the case and a black polyurethane one which is so comfortable. It's super easy to swap between the straps. For Sale: Album amp; Timestamp: http://imgur.com/gallery/4bXCueh A brand new 24mm Genuine Leather BUND STRAP handmade by Sherp Leatherwork of Poland in a vintage style. Using specially aged :Italian leather. Very high quality. Thickness:3mm approx (5mm in the watch case area). The color is slightly darker than as seen in the pictures. Suitable for any watch. I purchased this for my Panerai and tried it just once but I realised I wanted something for daily use and this strap is more rugged than I can pull off in an office environment. But for someone with a bigger wrist and outdoor use this will be perfect. The leather is very soft and extremely comfortable. I paid USD 48 plus shipping so I am ready to give this for ~~$40~~ $30 plus shipping (approx $20) so it will $50 shipped.
18 - I want it, I need it, need to make me feel heated.

For those who had asked for a picture of the pen inked - I am happy to share this writing sample. The nib had a few issues initially - The tines were very tight and the pen would run dry after a few lines. Got this sorted out by a local nibmeister and now it writes like a dream (touche....lol)!
Is the Pd nib pen for sale? Make me an offer if interested. Thanks for the trivia!
BC - Before Corona

Verification amp; Image gallery: http://imgur.com/gallery/YO4LIUg For Sale: A Limited Edition rare to come by Visconti London Fog purchased by me from a seller only a couple of months ago. The pen is in perfect condition with no visible marks, scratches or dents (might have microscratches) and cap closes nicely. The nib is the original 23Kt Palladium which is super smooth (slightly stubby) and writes a wet broad line. The nib had some flow issues when I bought it but I have had it repaired from a nibmeister and now it writes quite well.
